curam.util.security

Class JWTToken

    Class to handle functionality for JWT access tokens.

    • Method Detail

      • generateJWT

        public static java.lang.String generateJWT(java.lang.String subject,
                                           java.lang.String issuer,
                                           DateTime expiryDateTime)
        Generates a signed JWT. The signature used for signing will be retrieved based on details from the keystore and alias that is configured in the CryptoConfig jar.
        Parameters:
        subject - The value to set for the 'sub' field of the JWT - this should be the username of the logged in user.
        issuer - The value to set for the 'iss' field of the JWT.
        expiryDateTime - the value to set for the 'exp' field of the JWT, which sets when the JWT will expire.
        Returns:
        The signed JWT.
